IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Found mainly in the sediment-rich rocky biotope and is frequently occurs over sand in the intermediate habitat.  Feeds on plankton in the open water.  Remains close to rocks while foraging.  Territorial males feed from rock biocover (Ref. 5595).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Endemic to Chisumulu Island in the northeastern part of the Lake Malawi.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size

dataObjects.description: Found mainly in the sediment-rich rocky biotope and frequently occurs over sand in the intermediate habitat. Feeds on plankton in the open water. Remains close to rocks while foraging. Territorial males feed from rock biocover.
